about.paragraph:
Hello, my name is Tristan.

I am a Front End Software Developer who enjoys solving problems with code. I have over two years of experience developing and maintaining applications using a variety of tools and languages.

The latest technologies I have been working with include JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP, Next.js, Node.js, GSAP, and Gulp.js

tristansetha@gmail.com
